name: AS_GCM_CPS_ruleConditionUser
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!value: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(
      ri!ruleCondition[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.value]
    ),
    null,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_fromJson_v1"(
      ri!ruleCondition[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.value]
    )
  ),
  if(
    ri!readOnly,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
      labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayUser(user: local!value)

    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pickerFieldUsers"(
      maxSelections: 1,
      required: true,
      groupFilter: a!match(
        value: ri!ruleCondition[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.refClauseDataId],
        equals: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CLAUSE_SET_DATA_CONTRACTING_OFFICER,
        then: cons!AS_GAM_GRP_CONTRACTING_OFFICER,
        equals: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CLAUSE_SET_DATA_CONTRACT_SPECIALIST,
        then: cons!AS_GAM_GRP_CONTRACT_SPECIALIST,
        equals: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CLAUSE_SET_DATA_CONTRACT_OFFICER_REP,
        then: cons!AS_GAM_GRP_CONTRACTING_OFFICER_REPRESENTATIVE,
        default: null
      ),
      placeholder: "Select a user",
      value: local!value,
      saveInto: {
        local!value,
        a!save(
          ri!ruleCondition[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.value],
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_toJson_v1"({ tostring(save!value) })
        ),
        ri!additionalSaves
      },
      label: "Value",
      labelPosition: "ABOVE",
      readOnly: ri!readOnly
    )
  )
)
